resources.string: Show the progress of the synchronization process between this application and the BoardGameGeek.com website.
Notifies you when a collection item or play has been successfully uploaded (added, changed, or deleted) to BoardGameGeek.com.
Display errors during synchronization or saving data locally. This is especially helpful for debugging purposes.
Display the current game being played including the elapsed time.
Let\'s you know whenever statistics are updated.
